item.title: Great use case for flexdashboard
item.description: Found this blog post by Jennifer Thompson today, thanks to the flurry of great content being shared on Twitter during #rstudioconf. It’s about making dashboards with the flexdashboard R package, with an application to monitoring clinical research. I’m definitely going to be using this at some point.
